org.apache.camel.converter.stream

Class OutputStreamBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • org.apache.camel.converter.stream.OutputStreamBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable

    public final class OutputStreamBuilder
extends OutputStream
    Utility to hide the complexity of choosing which OutputStream implementation to choose.

    Itself masquerades as an OutputStream, but really delegates to a CachedOutputStream of a ByteArrayOutputStream.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object build()
      Builds the result of using this builder as either a CachedOutputStream if stream caching is enabled, otherwise byte[].
